Title: Prison Break
Descriptions: Sebastian: We just received word that an ally of ours, Doctor Mobius, has been captured. The Yellow King Bandit remnants have him locked in a cell at Lukow airfield in a bunker beneath the radiated evacuation zone. We hear he's being tortured for information on how to weaponize the virus - please, there isn't much time - we need you to rescue him within the hour. I know you're a mercenary, so don't worry - you'll be rewarded for the job. These guys are ex-special forces, and it's dark down there - you'll need to be well-prepared. Don't forget to wear NBC gear.

Sebastian: We just received word that an ally of ours, Doctor Mobius, has been captured. The Yellow King Bandit remnants have him locked in a cell at Lukow airfield in a bunker beneath the radiated evacuation zone. We hear he's being tortured for information on how to weaponize the virus - please, there isn't much time - we need you to rescue him within the hour. I know you're a mercenary, so don't worry - you'll be rewarded for the job. These guys are ex-special forces, and it's dark down there - you'll need to be well-prepared. Don't forget to wear NBC gear.
Sebastian: Dependable as usual. Thanks, survivor. You saved god knows how many lives. Here's your payment.
